statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{3 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x + 5 , -5 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 3 , -3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 3 , 3 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 3 \, x - 5 , 3 \, x^{3} - 5 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 2\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
